item.title: May 2023 Update
item.dc:creator: Jacob Larkin
item.description:

from IPython.display import Markdown
from tabulate import tabulate
table = [["Sun",696000,1989100000],
         ["Earth",6371,5973.6],
         ["Moon",1737,73.5],
         ["Mars",3390,641.85]]
Markdown(tabulate(
  table, 
  headers=["Planet","R (km)", "mass (x 10^29 kg)"]
))
Table 1: Planets
Planet R (km) mass (x 10^29 kg)
Sun 696000 1.9891e+09
Earth 6371 5973.6
Moon 1737 73.5
Mars 3390 641.85

Test Note

Note that this is a test note callout block here.

library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
penguins |>
  mutate(
    bill_ratio = bill_depth_mm / bill_length_mm,
    bill_area  = bill_depth_mm * bill_length_mm
  )

Duis nisl tortor, consectetur sed hendrerit at, dictum at odio. Sed vel arcu non nibh ultrices blandit eget et nisl. item.title: Welcome To My Blog
item.dc:creator: Tristan O'Malley
item.description:
This is the first post in a Quarto blog. Welcome!

Since this post doesn’t specify an explicit image, the first image in the post will be used in the listing page of posts.
